data.text: Nui nii kpalai ga ɠakalaʋɛ nɔ, toɠa ɗa maaɠooza zɔiti ba,
Ɠimalala nui yiima vaa la ga faaɠaaɠaa vai,
Siɛgi zu nu ɲɔi ʋaazu la, wɔinzeɠemai ɠa ɗa ʋilɛ polu, ti ʋa.
Nui ɓɔɛ wooiti ti da, ta ga ziɛi buuzeiɗai gola,
Maa la nɛɛni, nu ʋa lo faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ʋolu,
Ɠimalala nui ná-kpɔɛiti ta ɗa sakpegi loo,
Ɠimalala nui a ɠɛna ɓɔɛa, toɠa ɗa ɓɔɠɔ ɠoloɠolo fai ɠɛ,
Zɔɠɔzuziɛ nui ná-kpɔɛiti kɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ ani ɲɛmigiti,
Zɔi é ná-botiɠɛ vai maaɠonɔɔsu,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ga pɛlɛ ɠaaɠoozagi,
Kpɛtɛ nui yeaɠɔligi ɠa bɛ ga taa wolai siɠigi ma,
Siɛgi zu wasogi nui yiimaʋɛ laavesu da, koloɠolo geei zeelia.
Zɔi é gooɠaaʋotegi veezu, aisa é ʋa woilo kpɔɛi ma, é wosu,
Kisiɛ ʋagɔi ɠa zobo fe nui ʋɛ, é ziɛ seeɓɛi wu,
Keleɠele nui wɔinʋɛ ga é faaɠwɛgi zɔlɔɔ,
Faanɛɛi ɠa ɗa peleiti daalao,
Nu mɔungi é ɓaazaɠazu, toɠa ɗa ɠɛ eɠɛ toɠa gaamai zea,
Kpakutoomai ɠa ɗa sakpegi ɓe,
Nu zeeli vai ɓaaʋɛ ɠɛɛɠɛloin ma, nii maawanaai, é leʋe taa wolai ʋa, nii siɠigi ma.
Ɛsɛ ka ɗa daawooiti ma lɔnɔgiti kɔɠɔ, é yiɠo ga tiye,
Saai ta zɛnvui ta zoo zɔlɔɔsu nui nɛgi zaɓui zu.
Nui a anzai zɔlɔɔna, é undaanɛɛi zɔlɔɔga,
Bala nui ɠa ɗa ɓɔɛ ga maanɛɛnɛ wooi,
Nui nii bɔɔlai mɔinɗai, ta polu kpɔlɔ vai ma,
